analysisPopulations.name: Phase I Study Population
analysisPopulations.label: Phase I
analysisPopulations.description: Subjects with mild dementia and cognitive impairments participating in a single arm 6 weeks remote exercise intervention
analysisPopulations.criteria: Male and female patients with MCI and mild dementia (formal diagnosis or MoCA score between 20-26), ambulatory (able to walk a distance of 20m with or without walking assistance), living independently in a residential home with a caregiver/informant, willing and able to provide informed consent

analysisPopulations.name: Phase II Intervention Group
analysisPopulations.label: Phase II Intervention
analysisPopulations.description: Subjects randomized to perform 24 exercise sessions remotely using the Exergaming system at home
analysisPopulations.criteria: Male and female patients with MCI and mild dementia (formal diagnosis or MoCA score between 20-26), ambulatory, living independently with a caregiver/informant, randomized to intervention arm

analysisPopulations.name: Phase II Control Group
analysisPopulations.label: Phase II Control
analysisPopulations.description: Subjects randomized to perform exercise sessions in person under supervision with the Exergaming system
analysisPopulations.criteria: Male and female patients with MCI and mild dementia (formal diagnosis or MoCA score between 20-26), ambulatory, living independently with a caregiver/informant, randomized to control arm

characteristics.name: MoCA Score
characteristics.description: Montreal Cognitive Assessment score between 20-26 indicating mild cognitive impairment or mild dementia

characteristics.name: BMI
characteristics.description: Body mass index calculated from height and weight measurements

characteristics.name: Comorbidities
characteristics.description: Co-existing medical conditions scored using Kaplan Co-morbidity Index

characteristics.name: Frailty Status
characteristics.description: Frailty status assessed using Fried Frailty criteria (weight loss, grip strength, physical activity, walk time, exhaustion)

characteristics.name: Peripheral Neuropathy
characteristics.description: Vibration Perception Threshold (VPT) testing at distal great toe, heel and 5th metatarsal

characteristics.name: Diabetes Status
characteristics.description: Presence of diabetes, type and duration

characteristics.name: Depression
characteristics.description: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale (CES-D) score

characteristics.name: Quality of Life
characteristics.description: PROMIS Global quality of life assessment

characteristics.name: Tobacco History
characteristics.description: Pack years, current smoker status, previous smoker, no tobacco history
